title: Virgin Lesson
sinopse:
Takeda Una's ultimate wish is to find a boyfriend with whom to spend a romantic Christmas. All her previous boyfriends were weirdos, so she is nervous about being able to find a normal one. Will she succeed in her quest? (Source: Shoujo Crusade)

Includes the one-shot: I Heard the Ocean
Kaoko has had a traumatic experience and so has Saki. Is this the start of a romantic relationship?
